title: Mistress of Alkuon
description: Adya, the First of Her Name and Asperia’s Last Subcreator, is on the run. Betrayed and broken, dispossessed of her estates, she flees into the Forbidden Wastes. Accompanied by Conrad, the first of her consorts, her plight compels her to seek the ancient Gods, who have passed out of time and memory...In the distant skies beyond, Dr Renate Steenkamp continues to vie for the right to lead Halcyon Entertainment’s bold new mission to the planet’s surface. To protect the planet’s indigenous people, Renate cannot afford to slip behind in the Trials. In the ensuing months, she must not only outwit Halcyon’s wicked and cunning CEO, Hugo Bareilles, but she must also overcome her fear, loneliness and a myriad of temptations...They are two women from vastly different worlds that are destined to collide, the fates of many in their hands...
author: Jake Karter
